author: fitz
msg: Preparatory work for using various fs tests (beginning with the lock
tests) to test the fsfs backend in addition to the bdb backend.
Create a new directory for tests that aren's implementations (e.g. bdb
vs fsfs) specific.  Pull locks tests out of the fs_base test suite and
move them to their own file in the fs test directory.
No changes to the test framework have been made yet to accomodate
testing fsfs--this is just a preparatory commit.
tests that live in this directory (just the locks tests for now.
3 seconds instead of 5, which was causing intermittent test
